system.description:
Your nature magic, combat training, and supernatural blood have made you a ferocious combatant and you can draw upon the power in your blood to augment your magic. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Constitution, Intelligence, or Wisdom score increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
  • You gain an additional maneuver of a degree you could learn from the combat tradition you selected in the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-feats.Item.cIQtggIamkohqODp]{Natural Vitae} feat.
  • Half your druid levels count as bloodblade levels for the purpose of the Accelerated Recovery feature.
  • Half your bloodblade levels count as druid levels for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.8b9mc93q0f5wxsnk]{Harmonize or Tyrannize} feature.
  • Your blood becomes powerfully infused with natural power in addition to its other properties. When casting a spell of the affliction, necrotic, or healing schools, you can roll a hit die and either cause the target to regain hit points or take necrotic damage equal to the result. If the spell targets more than one creature, choose one target to be affected.
